content: this is a sock pattern for how i like to make my socks it is a cuff down sock pattern with a choice of three ribbings a slip_stitch heel flap and gusset you can also chose between a rounded toe or standard wedge toe the pattern is written in a way that you can use your preferred method to work in the round socks are sized to fit feet with a 8 9 9 5 10 inch circumference - all sizes include approx 1 inch of negative ease written into the pattern - so chose a size based on your foot circumference 8-9 stitches per inch is great i hope you enjoy this pattern as much as i enjoy making socks and if you have any questions feel free to message me smile
